content: ppppeeeettttiiiitttteeee ppppuuuummmmppppkkkkiiiinnnn size 6 cm/ 2 1/2 in x 6 cm/ 2 1/2 in yarn 30 yd mini skein fynn worsted superwash merino by rhichard devrieze needles 3 25 mm double point set gauge 22 sts and 26 row = 10 cm/ 4 in cast on 30 sts leaving a tail approx 50 cm/ 20 in join in round being careful not to twist sts over needle place a marker on 1st st round 1 knit round 2 k2 m1 repeat to end = 45 sts round 3 to 20 knit round 21 k1 k2tog repeat to end = 30 sts round 22 knit cut yarn leaving a tail approx 50 cm/ 20 in and thread through all sts twice around tighten and secure do not cut end stuff pumpkin with fibre filling and thread cast on tail through all cast on sts twice around tighten and secure to close opening do not cut end using the cast off tail thread yarn from top of pumpkin over the outside of work and up through bottom centre point to top centre point tighten slightly to create definition repeat 6 to 8 times spacing each rotation apart as in photo use cast on tail if needed secure ends and bury into fi- bre filling i cord stem 2 needles will be used cast on 4 sts with scrap yarn slide these 4 sts to beginning of needle do not turn with second needle knit 4 sts repeat until stem measures 3 cm/ 1 1/4 in cast off all sts sew this end to top of pumpkin at centre optional stem cut a small twig to insert into top of pumpkin at centre
